pr_title: screenmarker: add ability to put screen markers around widgets

timeline.message:
screenmarker: add ability to put screen markers around widgets
Gives you the ability to put the screen marker around a widget by clicking on the said widget

Co-authored-by: melkypie <5113962+melkypie@users.noreply.github.com>

screenmarker: add ability to put screen markers around widgets
Gives you the ability to put a screen marker around a widget that has a menu option attached to it

Co-authored-by: Jasper Ketelaar <Jasperketelaar@kpnmail.nl>

timeline.author: deathbeam

timeline.bodyText: We usually (or always) use Overlay in overlay names
timeline.author: deathbeam
deathbeam

timeline.bodyText: final, and just pass widget.getChild(param0) to drawHighlight directly
timeline.author: deathbeam
deathbeam
deathbeam
deathbeam

timeline.bodyText: This is literally same method as startCreation(Point location)
timeline.author: deathbeam
